name: Lovely Shape
description:
Lovely Shape is a super basic kids game, made for Ludum Dare 35, where you help the pack-lady find the things she wants. I've run out of time. Agh! Submit! Submit!

There are bugs. Didn't have enough time to fix a few of them. The colours are a bit wrong, sometimes items fall off the world, and you may have trouble picking up items that are behind other items. Also, runs pretty slowly in the browser. Yay!
